title: Warui Ko no Tame no Wasuremono Techou
original_name: 悪い子のためのわすれもの手帖
sinopse:
A collection of short stories. Chapter 1: Sano tends to forget some things - a wallet, a pen. Little things. There are also things he doesn't forget - like making sure Ashihara is around to remind him when he "forgets" something. It's not deliberate. Really.

(Source: Storm in Heaven & Bliss)
